name: habitat-suitability-model-02_download_presences
label: occurrences of a species
description:
In this script, the study area is defined and the occurrences
# of a species of choice inside this area are downloaded together with an overview 
# of the datasets.

inputs.name: input
inputs.label: 01_setup
inputs.description: JSON file containing the setup information

inputs.name: study_area_file
inputs.label: study_area
inputs.description: RDS file containing the study area

outputs.name: datasets_all
outputs.label: datasets_all
outputs.description: csv file containing all datasets used in the analysis

outputs.name: mydata_eurobis
outputs.label: mydata_eurobis
outputs.description: RDS file containing the occurrences of the species in the study area from Eurobis

outputs.name: study_area
outputs.label: study_area
outputs.description: RDS file containing the study area used in the analysis

author: LifeWatch ERIC
